document.bingtitle: In the beginning, there was a craving. And it was good. | White Castle
document.webtitle: In the beginning, there was a craving. And it was good. | White Castle
document.description: White Castle history, shown in a century-long visual mix of U.S. history.
document.body:
News Timeline Fun Facts Gone Green Employment Regions Frozen Sliders | Tips In the beginning, there was a craving. And it was good.
In 1921, a little shack in Wichita Kansas opened its window. And by the end of the day, with a $3.75 profit in his pocket, our founder knew he was on to something.
